description:
On the last but one day of every month, at 06:30 p.m. precisely, a scary demon knocks at the door of the poor sisters` apartment: It`s the apartment owner collecting the rent. To their surprise and relief he didn`t come today, and Kyou already begins to daydream: What if he has won in a lottery and doesn`t care about the rent any more?
But when they learn that the owner has broke his leg and is hospitalized, and no one would visit him, Asu begins to feel sorry for him.

titles.title: A Day with the Landlord, a Watermelon and a visit at the hospital
Ooya-san to Suika to Omimai no Hi
Um dia com o proprietário, sua doença e a melancia
大家さんとスイカとお見舞いの日
